full_text:
Case 21-58, Document 69-2, 04/15/2021, 3078116, Page2 of 2

5. Given that Ms. Maxwell (a) has relieved Cohen & Gresser as counsel on these appeals, and (b) is currently represented in these appeals by Mr. Markus, I respectfully request to be relieved as counsel for Ms. Maxwell in these appeals.

6. Maurene Comey, Assistant United States Attorney, has informed me that the Government does not oppose this motion.

Dated: New York, NY April 15, 2021

Respectfully submitted,
COHEN & GRESSER LLP
By: /s/ Christian R. Everdell
Christian Everdell ceverdell@cohengresser.com 800 Third Avenue, 21st Floor New York, NY 10022 Phone: (212) 957-7600 Fax: (212) 957-4514

Attorneys for Ghislaine Maxwell

2
DOJ-OGR-00020287

text_blocks.content: 5. Given that Ms. Maxwell (a) has relieved Cohen & Gresser as counsel on these appeals, and (b) is currently represented in these appeals by Mr. Markus, I respectfully request to be relieved as counsel for Ms. Maxwell in these appeals.
6. Maurene Comey, Assistant United States Attorney, has informed me that the Government does not oppose this motion.
Respectfully submitted, COHEN & GRESSER LLP By: /s/ Christian R. Everdell

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court filing related to the case of Ghislaine Maxwell. It is a formal request to be relieved as counsel for Ms. Maxwell. The document is signed by Christian R. Everdell of Cohen & Gresser LLP.
